content.en: Cache optimization: Researchers have developed various algorithms to optimize the performance and energy efficiency of cache systems in embedded processors. These algorithms include frameworks for program transformations, dynamic cache management techniques, customizable cache controllers, software-assisted replacement mechanisms, and code relocation techniques. By utilizing these algorithms, researchers aim to reduce cache misses, improve cache predictability, optimize memory accessing, and enhance cache performance in embedded systems.
content.da: Cache-optimering: Forskere har udviklet forskellige algoritmer til at optimere ydeevnen og energieffektiviteten af cache-systemer i indlejrede processorer. Disse algoritmer inkluderer rammer for programtransformationer, dynamiske cache-management-teknikker, tilpasningsdygtige cache-controllere, software-assisterede udskiftningsmekanismer og teknikker til koderelokation. Ved at anvende disse algoritmer sigter forskerne mod at reducere cache-misses, forbedre cache-forudsigelighed, optimere hukommelsestilgang og forbedre cache-ydelsen i indlejrede systemer.
